title: Orianna Ball Indicator Ghost
body:
Title pretty much says it. ill be playing Orianna and after a while a "ghost" of the ball indicator will appear and never go away untill the games over. I throw my ball onto my teammates alot cause I play Ori support  =p. So i get the indicator pretty much every game. im guessing it has something to do with you dieing when your ball is on an ally cause the ghost indicator usually points towards where I had died.

Id post an image but idk how to take a picture of my screen nor do I have an imgur  =p

replies.body:
If you wanna take a pic of your screen, just his prnt scrn and then paste in ms paint or some equivalent.

as for imgur, you don't need an account to upload an image, just drag an image from a folder to the imgur homepage, then select upload selection.

Hiya Starraka! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating! (This one's a bit tricky!)
this happened to me in an aram, unsure of cause though. And you probably need a full steps to reproduce for them to even look into a bug like this, along w/ a picture/video
